SHORT_DESCR.P: This is for the provision of statutory Residential and Nursing Care Services for vulnerable services users from the Borough of Walsall.
This is for the provision of statutory Residential and Nursing Care Services for vulnerable services users from the Borough of Walsall.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: The current provision will end on 31.3.2018. The Council previously called for competition however the process was unsuccessful. The Council is not yet ready to call for competition again and Regulation 72 of the PCRs does not provide for a modification which will allow the continuation of existing arrangements in the interim period. The Council has a statutory duty to provide Residential and Nursing Care Services to the Borough's vulnerable service users and therefore interim arrangements were required while a compliant procurement process is completed to establish a Residential and Nursing Care Services Framework Agreement. The interim Transitional contract arrangement will commence on 1.4.2018 and continue for up to 12 months. The transitional contracts will be awarded to economic operators who currently have a contract in place and the separate application process will continue to be open to currently non contracted economic operators should a service user request to be placed at that home. One hundred economic operators are detailed in this notice (the form only permits one hundred economic operator details to be entered) however the Council currently have contracts in place with almost 200 economic operators in the Borough of Walsall and across the UK. The details of all of the economic operators are available at request. This number will change over the course of the interim arrangements as providers contracts are terminated or added through the application process however the value will remain the same.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.OFFICIALNAME: Royal Mencap South Street Residential Home
